attributes.action: Make Snapchat the way it was before the February Update
attributes.additional_details: 80% of youths hate this update so I am being the voice for all youths out there.
attributes.background: Snapchat was good and before the February update. It’s too confusing now and it’s putting people off using it.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
